name: The Branch Office
description:
All visuals were done by me. This is my first attempt to make something somewhat good-looking, I even made some animations. Not sure if I succeeded in what I wanted.

Jam's theme is "On the edge" and the restriction is "Boss", so I decided to make a game where you play as an office boss and you must control your subordinates, so they will do their jobs and not let the office fall from the literal edge of a branch.

The cool as hell soundtrack:
